description: This was the route of the 2011 Spring Chicken Enduro hosted by the Beachburg Off-Road Cycling Association.  The route was a mix of double-track, dirt roads, pavement and single-track.   Lots of muddy hike-a-bike this early in the spring.  Plan on at least 4 or 5 hours to complete this ride, depending on the time of year.  A few sections crossed private property (such as River Run Rafting), but the organizer obtained permission for our event.  The route included sections in the vicinity of the "Rapids-to-Rafters" trails built and maintained by Wilderness Tours Rafting.  They sell daily passes to access their trails.
directions: Park and start riding at the Beachburg County Trails, 631 Government Rd, Beachburg, ON
title: Beachburg Spring Chicken Enduro
